title: Time 'Mater
description: Mainly looking for an excuse to put my React knowledge to work, I set out to build a pomodoro timer. I find I’m more productive using the pomodoro technique, but most online timers are garish and covered in banner ads. With Time ‘Mater, I wanted to make something clean, direct, and friendly.

title: the Panda Zone
description: My wife and I primarily communicate through cute animal videos, and since red pandas are her favorite, I built this simple Javascript/jQuery application to serve up random red panda videos using the YouTube API. On future builds I’d like to add a button for folks to send me red panda videos they enjoy; as much as I enjoy the research I’d be glad to crowdsource it.

title: Bonsai Radio
description:
A personal project inspired by my fastidiousness about personal listening stats, Bonsai Radio is a web application which stitches together the Spotify and Last.fm APIs so users can manage their Spotify playlists based on a song’s metadata.
I'm quite proud to say I've officially deployed version one! Please check it out and let me know what features you want to see with v2.

title: AlCodeHolics Anonymous
description: This site was built as a mid-final project during my time at Alchemy Code Lab. I'd like to take another pass at the design in the future, however I'm very proud of the JavaScript under the hood, which was my primary focus in this team project.

If you select a base liquor and any/all of the household ingredients, this application will tell you what cocktails you can mix, as well as the cocktails you're the fewest ingredients away from being able to fix up.
